md:
giải nghĩa từ "rental" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Rental (n) - Thuê mướn
	* Meaning: The act of renting something, or the payment made for the use of something.
	* Example: "The rental of the car was expensive."
	* Related words: rent, lease, hire
2. Rental (adj) - Thuê mướn
	* Meaning: Relating to or used for renting.
	* Example: "The rental property was in a great location."
	* Related words: rentable, leased, hired

Note: The word "rental" can be used as both a noun and an adjective, depending on the context.

  1. Rental (n) - Thuê mướn
    • Meaning: The act of renting something, or the payment made for the use of something.
    • Example: "The rental of the car was expensive."
    • Related words: rent, lease, hire
  2. Rental (adj) - Thuê mướn
    • Meaning: Relating to or used for renting.
    • Example: "The rental property was in a great location."
    • Related words: rentable, leased, hired

Note: The word "rental" can be used as both a noun and an adjective, depending on the context.
